Class Yhorm

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.LordOfCinder
game.Yhorm
All Implemented Interfaces:
DesignOSoulsAddOn, MarsAddOn, Capable, Printable, ActorStatus, Aggressor, EmberForm, Resettable, Soul
public class Yhorm
extends LordOfCinder
implements Soul, Aggressor, ActorStatus, Resettable, EmberForm
Lord of cinder. Weak to storm ruler.

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Yhorm will do nothing until the player is within Yhorm's radius. Then Yhorm will switch to aggro
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written

      an action from yhorm's behaviour

    • resetInstance

      public void resetInstance​(GameMap map)
      To reset Yhorm if he has not been defeated. 1. Set behaviour back to DoNothingBehaviour 2. Heal back to full health 3. Set great machete hit rate back to default 4. Remove ember form if it applies
      Specified by:
      resetInstance in interface Resettable
      Parameters:
      map - game map
